features: 【1080P FHD & 170 ° Wide Angle 】With 1920*1080P Full HD 30FPS resolution and 2.45" IPS screen, this dash cam provide you powerful evidence in case of dispute if you have a crash and achieve you peace of mind while driving. 170 degree wide angle and 6G IR lens with advanced sensors also give you crystal clear day & super night vision and wider blind spot free driving scene.

【Built-in Wi-Fi Live View】Download the "Viidure" APP from the APP Store or Google Play to easily connect your dash cam to your mobile device (Android and IOS compatible). With the built-in Wi-Fi feature, you can view footage, playback, live view, and download files directly to your phone for easy sharing with friends, family, insurance companies, police, or any social media such as Facebook, Twitter, or YouTube.

【Loop Recording & G-sensor Lock】The dash cam will continue to record, automatically overwriting the oldest video with the newest when SD card is full. When an accident happens, G-sensor function will lock current video and make sure locked videos are not overwritten by loop recording. These important features provide you with an exciting and safe driving experience.

【Super Night Vision & Parking Monitor】 This dash cam features an f2.0 aperture, advanced sensor and WDR technology for greater image accuracy and clarity. Day or night, it clearly captures night driving road conditions and license plates. Parking monitor can help you when someone tries to steal your car or collide with your car while you are parked, the car camera will automatically turn on and start recording as evidence.

【Easy to Install and Operate】Easy to understand the operating system, detailed manual can help you easily install and operate the dashcam, even if you are not good at the technology, save money to find a professional to install the dash cam. Perfect packaging, all accessories are in good condition. Excellent design, unique hidden mounting bracket, tightly mounted on the windshield, minimizing the impact on the driving view.

【3 Year warranty & Reliable After-sales Service】 We promise you 24/7 online service, 30 days refund policy, 36 months warranty. Recommend using Class 10 Micro SD card, 32GB-128GB (Not Included). If you encounter any problem of the wifi dash camera, please contact us directly, your 100% satisfaction is our first guideline.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aronde FHD 1080P Dash Camera For Cars with WiFi APP Do you find it cumbersome having to download videos on your computer? This wifi dash cam helps you to easily view playback, share and download videos on the app in no time. Capture every moment of your driving. Warm Tips: 1.We recommend to use Class 10 or higher 32GB SD Card (Not included). Please Format SD Card firstly. 2. Please take off all protective films before starting to use. Insert and remove the SD card when camera is turning off.

Built-in 2.4G WiFi & APP Control Dash cam comes with an App for Android or iOS smartphones to get live streaming, download videos, change settings, edit and share your footage. Footage can be easily shared to YouTube, Twitter, Facebook or social media platforms.

1080P FHD WiFi Camera The F1.8 aperture, 6-layer lens and advanced chip are able to record videos with clear details. You don't have to worry about not being able to clearly record the license plate of the vehicle in front of you. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) Adjust the luminosity at the same time to improve the very dark and very bright parts of the video. Gives you a clear picture. Loop Recording Automatically overwrite the oldest file to save the current files. Detect significant or sudden movement and automatically lock files in the case of an event triggering the sensor.

2 Mounting Options Suction cup and Sticky mount are provided. You can choose what you want. Suction cup can be taken off easily while sticky one is more stable on the windshield. Parking Monitor Under Parking mode with power off, auto turning on and recording when detecting a vibration, to keep your car's safety. If you want 24-hour parking monitoring, please use with the hardwire kit (Not Included). Easy to Install Equipped with a wire trim tool and wire clips, you can easily install the dash cam. Connect the suction cup and the dash cam, find the right position of the windshield, and then install it, wiring reference as above.

Specification Video Resolution 1080P/720P Screen Type 2.45 inch IPS Display Audio Recording Built-in microphone, On / Off optional Video Format/Video Coding MOV/H.264 USB interface Type-C USB Internal&External power supply Built-in Li-ion Battery & DC 5V / 1.5A Operating Temperature 14°F~122°F ( -10°C~50°C ) Operating System Viidure APP Storage Micro SD Card (up to 128GB)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly fine, all you need for your dash camera for the reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with my purchase. Actually, I bought two of them: one for myself and another one for my wife. Very well packed, light weight, compact and attractive appearance. Suctions cup holds very firmly on the windshield. Setup was a breeze; menu is user friendly and intuitive. The quality of the picture is very good, even at nighttime. Wi-Fi application works perfectly fine, was able to upload video files without any problems. If you take a snapshot and zoom it out you can easily read a license plate on the car in front of you. Glad that I have chosen a dash cam without SD card included. Instead, I bought high-capacity ultra speed SD 128 GB card just for $10. Camera starts recording as soon as you start the engine. USB cable very short, tried to use it to charge my cell phone - was very slow. Cigarette lighter car charger has no extra ports to charge a phone. Overall, pretty good quality and all you need to protect your car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately I don’t have a photo of the camera to provide as I bought it for my girlfriend for safety reasons so she has the camera. But it was rather quick and easy to set up and the clips that came with it were helpful as well. The camera screen is rather large for dash came which is nice. But the fact that it comes with an app to access the camera is even better, it is very clear when reviewing the footage and easy to access the videos. Just make sure to set the G sensor to low other wise it will save just about every video recorded and quickly fill up all the SD storage in a matter of days. I know because I experienced it. Other wise the camera works perfect and is worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SOLID AND CLEAR DASH CAM
reviews.reviewText: The camera has an excellent definition in 1080P, it is very light, easy to install on the windshield of the car, loop recording, and easy to manage and connect via Wifi with the App on the phone to view what was recorded when you need it. Unbeatable price-quality ratio. 100% recommended, no regrets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dashcam, Easy Install
reviews.reviewText: This is a good dashcam that is well-made and easy to install. The suction cup grips the glass like it's superglued. The picture quality is fine for such an inexpensive device. Very good value it seems to me. It is fitted with quite a long wire so that running it to the cigarette lighter is to problem. I'd buy it again and recommend it to anyone looking for a dashcam that's of good build and not crazy expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY! Useless dash camera! - see 3 month update
reviews.reviewText: 3 month update:The camera never gives off it's "wifi" signal anymore, meaning the app used to control the camera no longer works. I can't access videos through the app anymore, so if I needed to say, show a police officer video evidence of an accident, I wouldn't be able to do show it through my phone. You can still access the videos through a PC, but the point of the app is to be able to show someone, like a police officer, on the spot to prove yours or someone else's innocence.Another thing I learned after accessing the videos through my PC, the camera does not overwrite old videos the way you think it would. The camera saves every video until the storage is full, and then only overwrites the last video made. I had videos from when I first purchased the camera on September to the end of October, but nothing from the November, and the only video from December was my last minute of driving home just now. Utterly useless because it does not save a log of events, it just deleted the very last video made, so the minute before the most recent! What use is videos from 3 months ago when people rely on these in accidents that happen in the now?! USELESS!Luckily, I have not had to rely on this camera at all since purchasing, but heed my update as a warning. DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!------------------------Video quality is pretty good. It's very easy to install and the suction cup is fairly strong. I keep mine under my rear view mirror. The power cord that comes with it comes pre wired to a cigarette lighter plug. I think it should have come with a USB cord instead so you can plug it into your computer.The only thing that loses this a star is the app for it. The app is terrible. It either crashes or does not want to connect to the camera and needs to be reset. As far as I can tell, you need the app to set the camera up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winner of several units tested
reviews.reviewText: Had a really hard time finding a Dashcam in the under $50 range that check all my boxes. This was it. Two other brands i tested didn't work right out of the box. of the remaining units i tested, this unit had the best image quality (clear and bright, even in low light). Like that it worked great out of the box with out installation of any phone app. Full control using the screen and buttons (though an app is available to monitor, control, and download videos if you like). I'd rather just pop the SD card out and go directly to the computer. I'm sure you can get better image quality with a higher end camera, but for under $50, this one was impressive. Overall operation was straightforward and easy to get it to do what i wanted. My only complaint is the unit is too big (some folks may see that as a plus). For a Dashcam, i want small and unobtrusive, but enough screen and indicators to tell it is working. I'd recommend this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent DashCam, Great value!
reviews.reviewText: In short, I am very happy with the product. It was easy to install, just following the instructions which are written in good English. I especially loved the crank on the suction cup, never seen these before. Suction cups are usually a weak spot for windshield-mounted devices but this one works very well. Connecting to the phone was smooth. One thing I noticed later was that when the phone is connected to another WiFi network, the device would not connect to the phone. But, turning WiFi on the phone off and then back on solved the problem.I really love the ability to download the video and watch/show it right away without moving the card to a computer.In short, I find this device to be a great improvement over what I used to-date and a great value.
